mapper.select: SELECT AR.DTL_CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , AR.DTL_CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , AH.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , AH.MEXNO_ENCR AS MEXNO , AH.CRAL_IDV_TNO , AH.LOCARA_TNO , AH.EXNO_ENCR AS EXNO , AH.IDV_TNO , AH.HIST_STRT_DTM AS CH_DTM , U0.EPNO AS FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , U0.USR_NM AS FNL_MDFC_USR_NM FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL AR INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_CH_HIST AH ON AR.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = AH.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND AH.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMY_USR_M U0 ON AH.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID = U0.USR_ID AND U0.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND U0.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE AR.DTL_CNTR_NO = #{CNTR_NO} AND AR.DTL_CNTR_SN = #{CNTR_SN} AND AR.CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '020' AND AR.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' AND AR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY AH.HIST_STRT_DTM
